descriptionHtml:
Thanks to Saiodin for the episode. :)
[youtube]LyK22lqOV0Q[/youtube]

Oh and thanks to everyone who give me endorsements,feedback,support and advice.I\'m really very appreciate that.

This mod contains 2 armor set and 2 weapon now. Next I going to try something different, more exciting armor or cloth.

[color=Blue][size=6]What\'s new[/size][/color](Ver1.21)
==================
Finally patch uploaded. Now you can craft the leather version assassin\'s armor set.
==================

Armor
==================
Favored armor set is a light armor set for both male and female character(CBBE and UNP compatible), cloth version included.

The armor set include cuirass glove and boots.You dont need PERK to craft and improve the armor set, steel tag.

If you need a cloth version,try MISC tag.

The concept comes from a original painting for Kingsoft\'s MMORPG.Brilliant work I must say.Too bad I never found the author on the intelnet.Anyway I grab the concept model and texture it.

Assassian\'s costume is female only costume for stealth character. You can CRAFT leather version now,  and Radiant Remnants shop in Solitude sells the cloth version. Have fun.
==================

Weapon
==================
Massive black.....is not that Massive black you know.It\'s a standard military sword.Sharp deadly and simple weapon.Believe or not go check the shining blade yourself. :)

Scarlet is a sword,maybe a katana?Whatever,more detials more meshes.If you don\'t like massive black or fancy a blade with curve,try this one.Craftable,everything is same as massive black except the model.

No PERK is required, steel label.

==================

Credits
==================
Bethesda for the great game.
Caliente for Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition.
The nameless artist for the orginal painting.(I google and google again but never find out who he/she is)

MadiBlitz for the  \"Mysterious Ninja Girl\".

My sweet sis who help me do the screenshot part while my laptop @#%@#$^@  :)

Promission Note
==================
Everybody could use this mod freely except 3DM.I would never give them my permission.
